title: Self-Regulation and Co-Regulation Competency Enhancement Program through Collaborative Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: A small team (3-4 members) project-based learning environment utilizing smartphones as the primary learning tool

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies with a frequency of over 80% during collaborative problem-solving processes.
Learners can improve project goal achievement rates by 20% through co-regulated activities with peers.
Learners can maintain at least five weekly statements indicating social presence in online discussions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
